channel.title: Secnotes on Laladee
channel.description: Recent content in Secnotes on Laladee

item.title: Tunneling and Port Forwarding
item.description: SSH Tunnel config in /etc/ssh/sshd_config N - do not execute a remote command Socket tunnel with SSH ssh -ND 8080 username@12.12.12.12 Port forwarding with SSH Remote port forwarding: ssh -g -NL 1337:12.12.12.150:8000 username@12.12.12.12 Now connect to 12.12.12.12 on port 1337 will get tunneled to 12.12.12.150 on port 8000 via 12.12.12.12 Remote port forwarding: GatewayPorts yes ssh -g -NR 1337:127.0.0.1:8000 username@12.12.12.12 Now connect to 12.12.12.12 on port 1337 will get tunneled to 127.

item.title: Android Pentest
item.description: Bypass SSL pinning Install Burpsuiteâ€™s certificate to system store Export certificate with Certificate in DER format option and named burp.der Convert certificate to crt/pem format: openssl x509 -in burp.der -inform DER -out burp.crt Rename to <hash>.0, get hash: openssl x509 -inform PEM -subject_hash_old -in burp.crt | head -n 1 rename: mv burp.crt 9a5ba575.0 Backup existing certs: adb shell "cp /system/etc/security/cacerts/* /tmp" Create an in-memory mount: adb shell "mount -t tmpfs tmpfs /system/etc/security/cacerts" Copy the existing certs back into the tmpfs mount: adb shell "mv /tmp/*.

item.title: Enumeration
item.description: Subdomain Discovery Subdomain with amass amass enum -active -d hackerone.com -max-depth 3 -config amass.config.ini Example of config file https://github.com/OWASP/Amass/blob/master/examples/config.ini Others: subfinder, findomain, assetfinder Directory brute-force Directory brute-force with gobuster gobuster dir -w /usr/share/wordlists/seclists/Discovery/Web-Content/common.txt -u http://jeff.thm/backups/ -t 20 -x zip,txt,log,db,json,js,conf Wordlist: Fuzzing/fuzz-Bo0oM.txt, Web-Content/common.txt Directory brute-force with wfuzz wfuzz -c -w /usr/share/seclists/Discovery/Web-Content/big.txt -z list,php-txt-zip-log-db-json --hc 403,404 -t 20 -u http://10.10.10.187/utility-scripts/FUZZ.FUZ2Z
